original_text: And the angel of God said to him, “Take the meat and the unleavened cakes, and put them on this rock, and pour the broth over them.” And he did so.
korean_text: 하나님의 사자가 그에게 이르되 고기와 무교병을 가져다가 이 바위 위에 놓고 국을 부으라 하니 기드온이 그대로 하니라

sentences.original_text: And the angel of God said to him,
“Take the meat and the unleavened cakes,
and put them on this rock,
and pour the broth over them.”
